title: Little Buddha (1993) Keanu Reeves (Optional NORDIC SUBS+Eng)
description:
<a href="http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0107426/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0107426/</a>

Optional subtitles in separate idx/sub files:
Danish, Finnish, Norwegian, Swedish.
English (in srt format).

With Keanu Reeves, Bridget Fonda, Chris Isaak and Sogyal Rinpoche.
Written and directed by Bernardo Bertolucci.

A young American family in Seattle have their lives changed when a Buddhist monk claims that their young son is a holy man. Keanu Reeves got acclaim for his part as the Buddha, and singer Chris Isaak proved that he could also fill a major part as an actor.

A production error in northern Europe has left us without a retail DVD with multisubs for this film. One edition has only Finnish and Swedish subs, another (rental) has only Danish and Norwegian. I have combined the two editions in this package.

My new ripping procedure now produces decent quality for such a long film compressed into just 700 MiB. I enclose a sample for ye weak in faith. 

Widescreen DVDrip XviD 2-pass 720x288, really great stereo sound AC3.
Burn tested, runs well in both my standalone DivX players.
